Text.Value: *If he harmed Scratch somehow, he shows no sign of it.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The owlbear cub watches the player attentively.
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Node only plays if the player selects this option before learning the cub didn't hurt Scratch.

Text.Value: *Camp life seems to suit the young owlbear. His coat of feathers seems fuller. His eyes look bright and inquisitive.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player leans in and peers at the cub. The owlbear cub watches the player attentively.

Text.Value: Nice here. The cave smell like rotting meat. Goblin camp smell like goblins.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: This node if the player has pet the cub before (to prevent approval spamming)

Text.Value: You be nice to Scratch, understand?

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: If the previous CFM wasn't resolved fully that night, but the player later found Scratch unharmed.

Text.Value: Hello! You are not food. You are friend.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Owlbear cub looks sad and downcast.

Text.Value: Always! Scratch is friend. Takes care of me when scared at night.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Owlbear cub looks sad and downcast.

Text.Value: *The cub seems to brighten up a little at the mention of Scratch's name.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cub looks up at mention of Scratch's name

Text.Value: No - Scratch friend! Takes care of me when scared at night.

EditorData.NodeContext: Horrified at the thought of harming Scratch

Text.Value: You smell very delicious, but I will not bite you.

Text.Value: *The cub bows his head, as if in mourning.*

Sad. No want food. No want play.

Flag sets after the first instance of petting the owlbear cub, to prevent approval spam

Synopsis: Default dialogue with the owlbear cub in the player's camp - available after the events of CAMP_OwlbearCub_CFM_Dog. The player can pet the cub, ask some SwA questions and learn what happened during the previous CFM if they opted to quit the dialogue early (what sounded like the owlbear cub attacking the dog was actually the cub having a bad dream and the dog comforting him).
